snippet: On New Year's Eve, there will be two last calls at most California bars -- one for drinkers, another for smokers. ''It will be 'Happy New Year, put out your cigarettes,' '' said Bob McNeil, the manager of Plainfield Station, a bar and grill here, ...
lead_paragraph: On New Year's Eve, there will be two last calls at most California bars -- one for drinkers, another for smokers. ''It will be 'Happy New Year, put out your cigarettes,' '' said Bob McNeil, the manager of Plainfield Station, a bar and grill here, outside Sacramento. ''I think we all might be having that last cigarette right at 11:55 P.M.'' On Jan. 1, California will become the first state in the country to ban smoking in most bars and casinos.
abstract: California's pioneering ban on smoking in bars and casinos will go into effect on Jan 1 (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Most California Bars To Start Ban on Smoking
